long_description: From mountains to town, cool mornings to hot afternoons, you can adapt quickly and stay comfy as you hike or travel in the women's Kuhl Liberator Convertible Pants. Legs zip off to create shorts with an inseam of 10.5 in. Blended nylon/cotton fabric wicks moisture and dries faster than all cotton; offers UPF 40 sun protection. Durable water repellent finish beads up light precipitation. Stretch panels at back yoke, crotch gusset and side panels offer freedom of movement. Kuhl Liberator pants for women feature ankle zips for easy on/off over boots and a drawcord at waist to fine-tune the fit. Hand pockets; 2 back patch pockets with embroidered design; 2 zip side pockets.
short_description: From mountains to town, cool mornings to hot afternoons, you can adapt quickly and stay comfy as you hike or travel in the women's Kuhl Liberator Convertible Pants.
